name: 2018/10/26 Dinner
description: Dive into a healthy dinner with this high-protein, high-sodium, low-sugar recipe. Tailored for those seeking nutritious, Healthified Recipes, this meal is a perfect blend of mouth-watering ingredients designed to fuel your body while pleasing your palate.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Adlai Rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Adlai Rice according to package instructions until tender, about 20 minutes, then set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the Ginger root, Red Onion, Capsicum Green, Red Capsicum, and Carrots. Mince the Garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Season the chicken and ground beef separately with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan over medium heat, cook the chicken until fully cooked, about 15 minutes, then set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In the same pan, cook the ground beef until browned, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Add the finely chopped vegetables and minced garlic to the ground beef in the pan. Season with salt, pepper, and cumin seeds. Cook until the vegetables are softened, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cooked Adlai Rice, chicken, and beef-vegetable mixture. Stir thoroughly to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot and enjoy your nutritious dinner.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
